title: 怎么修改草方块上面那一面的图案？
author: 电x磁
txt_content:
本帖最后由 电x磁 于 2012-5-22 23:55 编辑 

侧面的我怎么改不了？

replies.author: 黄凯航
replies.txt_content:
你在说什么？图片呢？
为了防止你不懂怎么上传图片。。。
左上角图床教程
第1次

replies.author: geludan
replies.txt_content: in an update a couple months ago, Biomes were added, and with that, a tinting system for the grass and leaves. they are greyed out on the terrain.png and are then tinted ingame. the grass is the grey texture on the top left. the leaves are the two grey "leaf looking things" at the top-left-middle. don't worry, your not the first to ask this.

replies.author: 电x磁
replies.txt_content:
geludan 发表于 2012-5-23 16:59 
in an update a couple months ago, Biomes were added, and with that, a tinting system for the grass a ...
谢谢，我有什么好担心的

replies.txt_content:
电x磁 发表于 2012-5-23 11:58 
谢谢，我有什么好担心的
